synopsis.text: Teiouâ€™s radiant smile and unparalleled speed have made her the darling of the horse-racing world. As a member of Team Spica, she's been racking up victories and drawing attention from all corners of Japan. Inspired by her idol, the legendary Symboli Rudolf, Teiou has set her sights on the elusive Triple Crown. To claim this prestigious title, she must triumph in three consecutive G1 races, a feat not seen since Rudolf's reign. As she embarks on this ambitious journey, Teiou faces a myriad of challenges and rivals, both old and new. Each race brings her closer to her dream, but also presents her with decisions that could alter the course of her career. Amidst the thrill and competition, Teiou remains steadfast, determined to leave her mark in the world of horse racing and become an undefeated Triple Crown horse girl.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
